document.full_text: nine of the 11 members of an n.c.a.a. panel that will help decide the fiesta bowl's fate attended a bowl-sponsored retreat that included free meals, resort rooms and golf outings.
document.title: n.c.a.a. panel members attended bowl-sponsored retreat
lines_and_colors: nine of the 11 members of an n.c.a.a. panel that will help decide the fiesta bowl's fate attended a bowl-sponsored retreat that included free meals, resort rooms and golf outings.
